tech_news.title: GTA 6 Will Not Have a Physical Edition at Launch, It’s Claimed - Insider Gaming
tech_news.description: According to a new report, it seems that GTA 6 will not have a physical edition at launch to avoid leaks. Here are more details.

tech_news.title: Ubisoft launches voluntary redundancy process to cut 200 jobs from Paris head office - GamesIndustry.biz
tech_news.description: The process requires negotiation with trade unions, who have  previously denounced the recently-announced restructuring proposal.

tech_news.title: A powerful AMD gaming desktop is hundreds off at Costco - The Verge
